entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
